thread.title: Comment on Big Blue Madness tickets distributed in an hour by Twick39
thread.title_full: Comment on Big Blue Madness tickets distributed in an hour by Twick39

author: Twick39
title: Comment on Big Blue Madness tickets distributed in an hour by Twick39
text:
Posted in Basketball , Main | 10 Responses 
Here is your one reminder that Big Blue Madness tickets will be distributed at 10 pm tonight . If you’re not already in line outside Memorial Coliseum, you will have to go through Ticketmaster.com. There will be a limit of four tickets per person and online orders will come with a small service charge. 
Good luck, everyone. The majority of you will strike out, but I’m pulling for you. 
Go Cats. Article written by Drew Franklin I can recite every line from Forrest Gump, blindfolded. Follow me on Twitter: @DrewFranklinKSR 10 responses to “Big Blue Madness tickets distributed in an hour” KC88 October 2, 2015 at 10:05   
I clicked the second the clock flipped to 10pm on 3 different devices.. nothing– don’t think there were any even available online lol fail October 2, 2015 at 10:07   
same result as KC88, had 4 people going for them and nothing. Haven’t been able to get tickets in 4 years UKcatNKy October 2, 2015 at 10:08   
Same here…ticketmaster is the worst. By the time the page loaded the tickets were gone. noluck October 2, 2015 at 10:11   
Yeah, how is that even possible that it’s gone as soon as it loads? Ukbradstith October 2, 2015 at 10:12   
Same here, no luck this year or last, I was on 10 minutes early refreshing at the exact second…nothing. UKfanboii October 2, 2015 at 10:12   
Same. Five devices and nothing. How do people manage to have success with ticketmaster? Jacob October 2, 2015 at 10:16   
Yea was on hour early and as soon as it flipped to 10pm it wouldn’t let me in an then poof gone. Leuther October 2, 2015 at 10:18   
I got mine… DB11 October 2, 2015 at 10:19   
Pretty much what everyone said. I was on the page when the timer ran out and the tickets were gone within a minute. Twick39 October 2, 2015 at 10:20   
Fu#k ticketmaster
